properties.name: Aqaba
properties.description: Slept on the beach after having chased a thief who stole someones phone. I found him but realized I was too alone (weak) to do antyhing.

properties.name: Wadi Rum
properties.description: Hitchhiked with a bedouin who drove me past the guards to avoid the entrance fee. He then drove me into the Wadi where we found a spot in the shade to eat the first proper meal in a long time.

properties.name: Petra
properties.description: Went with Max and Keenan. Took me a long time to decide to actually pay the ridiculous entrance fee.

properties.name: Wadi Musa
properties.description: The entrance to Petra, slept here for 2 nights

properties.name: Amman
properties.description: Had a quick look at the historical center and stayed at the first hostel in the country. Palestinian caretaker who told me about how the Israelis shot at him when he was left between the borders in the middle of the night

properties.name: Jerash
properties.description: Visited for a few hours with Max.

properties.name: Karak
properties.description: Visited the fort en route south

properties.name: Aqaba
properties.description: Passed through on the way to the Dead Sea. Bought beer.

properties.name: Qasr Amra
properties.description: Our second desert castle while hitchhiking with Max and Keenan

properties.name: Qasr Azraq
properties.description: First of the desert castles. We took a bus here and hitchhiked back.

properties.name: Mount Nebo
properties.description: This is where Moses overlooked the promised land. The final stop before our driver returned back home. Our friendly driver basically drove us across the country

properties.name: Dead Sea
properties.description: Slept by the Dead Sea. Woke up with our legs white with salt
